labels.activeHintOn: Compo is visible publicly; users can submit and edit entries, and vote
labels.activeHintOff: Compo is hidden; entry submission, editing, and voting are blocked
labels.showVotingResultsHintOn: Scores, rankings, and entry files are publicly visible
labels.showVotingResultsHintOff: Scores and rankings are hidden; entry files hidden until voting starts
labels.isVotableHintOn: Users can vote on entries during the voting period
labels.isVotableHintOff: Voting disabled entirely; use for externally judged compos (e.g. Robocoding)
labels.hideFromArchiveHintOn: This compo appears in the public archive when the event is archived
labels.hideFromArchiveHintOff: This compo is excluded from the archive even when the event is archived
labels.hideFromFrontpageHintOn: Compo name and description are listed on the event landing page
labels.hideFromFrontpageHintOff: Hidden from event landing page; use while compo details are being finalized

0.title: No preview
0.description: Don't show any media preview (YouTube or image) on the public entry page

1.title: YouTube, then image
1.description: Show YouTube video if available, otherwise fall back to the uploaded image

2.title: Image only
2.description: Show only the uploaded image preview, ignore any YouTube URL

0.title: Required
0.description: Entrants must upload a separate image file (resized to 160x100 and 640x400 for thumbnails)

1.title: From entry file
1.description: Entry file itself is the image; entry formats must be png/jpg only

2.title: Optional
2.description: Entrants may upload an image file for thumbnails, but it's not required

3.title: Not allowed
3.description: No image file uploads allowed; entries will have no thumbnails
